chapter.title: Changes for &PRODUCT; Administrators
chapter.para: &PRODUCT; Administrators are people who are ultimately responsible for the operation and maintenance of an &PRODUCT; system. &PRODUCT; Administrators are responsible for adding new features and higher level tasks which sometimes require admin access to the Web UI and often command line access to the &PRODUCT; server they administer.

section.title: Changes since &LASTPRODVER;
section.para: The following changes for &PRODUCT; Administrators have have gone into effect since &PRODUCT; &LASTPRODVER;

varlistentry.term: Feature: New Cisco Additions to Linkd

listitem.para: The linkd topology discovery component will now take advantage of Cisco 2621, 3845, 2811, 2821 and 2801 devices.
New color options are available in chart-configuration.xml to change background colors. See Bug #3976Bug #3976 for configuration details.
It is now possible to write filter rules which utilize the foreignSource and foreignID node attributes. Bug: 4102

varlistentry.term: Bug Fix: Plain Text Notification Formatting

listitem.para: White space was stripped from notifications by the Web UI as well as on outgoing notifications that were manually entered into notifications.xml. Bug: 4056.
Whitespace missing in the IPLIKE install script caused an error message. Bug: 4065.
A group name with a space in it would be truncated by the Web UI. Bug: 4095. Renaming a group in the Web UI caused a duplicate group to be created. Bug: 4096.
